text: Nza Bakɨme Zisas Krais bunin vhuuiŋ, nta tuituigiap Fhe Bakɨmen tɨvir vhuuin nza khɨvav, nza nzuai. Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the mba buni vhuuiŋ thav, ana harigi khesharigi bunin gumgi khɨvi, mba buni Zisas bunin vhuuiŋ fara muuŋgi fhu, nza kaŋgi, mba guma, ana won tɨvira vuzvugiap, ana fhura rɨɨrɨɨi. Ana bigɨn thueŋ kaŋgi fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara! Ana bigi kaadogap, hurar bigi ga mbuav, kambai ndɨkndɨgi ga mbuav bigi bisarire ga nzuav, fhura daai. Kha khesharigi buni, nta gumgi ga mbuim, mbe harigi gumgi ga nzuav ndavi shi. Mbe ndavi shiav, wari daav, wari nzɨɨav, ndɨkndɨgi mbatɨgir harigi gumgi ga mbui.
